jitter.title: Critical Jitter
jitter.description: Signal variance (Gigue). The cause of unexplained lags.

bufferbloat.title: Bufferbloat
bufferbloat.description: Hardware bottleneck revealed by precise audit.

dashboard.warning: ISPs sell you '1 Gbps'. It's marketing. For Gaming, speed is worthless without STABILITY.
dashboard.mission: We built this tool for one reason: Stop the waste. Too many players buy overpriced routers when simple software tweaks would suffice.

rules.title: OUR GOLDEN RULE:
rules.one: 1. SOFTWARE FIRST: Check Drivers, QoS, DNS. It's free.
rules.two: 2. HARDWARE LAST: If physics is the cause, only then do we recommend specific gear.
